instructions.es: Gira a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Di bundaran, belok kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Alla rotonda svolta a sinistra verso Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rondzie skręć w lewo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Vire à esquerda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați la stânga spre Destination 1
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşakta Destination 1 istikametinde sola dön
